articles.title: At least 7 people are dead and 3 missing after a boulder crashes on tourist boats in Brazil - CNN
articles.description: At least seven people were killed after a massive rock fell on top of several tourist boats in the Brazilian state of Minas Gerais on Saturday, CNN affiliate CNN Brasil reported.
